com.yahoo.gondola

Interface Network

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Stoppable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MemoryNetwork, NastyNetwork, SocketNetwork

    public interface Network
extends Stoppable
    This class provides communication between the local member and remote members. More specifically, this class is used to create a channel between the local and remote members and the channel object provides streams which are used to send and receive data to remote members.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Channel createChannel(int fromMemberId, int toMemberId)
      Creates a communication channel between the local member and a remote member.
      String getAddress()
      Returns a string that can be used to contact the local member.
      List<Channel> getChannels()
      Returns a list of created channels.
      boolean isActive(String address)
      Returns true if the member at the given address is active.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.yahoo.gondola.Stoppable

        start, stop

    • Method Detail

      • createChannel

        Channel createChannel(int fromMemberId,
                      int toMemberId)
        Creates a communication channel between the local member and a remote member.
        Parameters:
        fromMemberId - the id of the local member
        toMemberId - the id of the remote member
        Returns:
        a non-null channel between fromMemberId and toMemberId

      • getAddress

        String getAddress()
        Returns a string that can be used to contact the local member. The storage system uses this string to help prevent multiple processes from accessing the database.
        Returns:
        An immutable non-null string representing the local member.

      • isActive

        boolean isActive(String address)
        Returns true if the member at the given address is active.
        Parameters:
        Non-null - address string that was returned from getAddress().
        Returns:
        The active state of the member at the specified address.

      • getChannels

        List<Channel> getChannels()
        Returns a list of created channels.
        Returns:
        a non-null list of created channels.
